content.en: Efficient Edit Distance: Researchers have proposed algorithms to compute the Normalized Edit Distance (NED) efficiently, with the same computing resources as the conventional unnormalized Edit Distance algorithm. They have also developed algorithms to compute the inter-string constrained edit distance and the distance between trees, as well as techniques for approximate string matching. These algorithms aim to quantify similarity between sequences and solve various string and tree editing problems efficiently.
content.da: Effektiv Redigeringsafstand: Forskere har foreslået algoritmer til effektivt at beregne den Normaliserede Redigeringsafstand (NED) med de samme computerressourcer som den konventionelle ikke-normaliserede Redigeringsafstand algoritme. De har også udviklet algoritmer til at beregne den inter-streng begrænsede redigeringsafstand og afstanden mellem træer samt teknikker til approximativ strengsammenligning. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at kvantificere ligheden mellem sekvenser og effektivt løse forskellige streng- og træredigeringsproblemer.
